metadata.name: Calmness
metadata.description: This video showcases the breathtaking juxtaposition of a serene beach nestled against majestic mountains. As the gentle waves caress the powdery soft sand, the backdrop of towering peaks creates a dramatic and awe-inspiring scene. The azure sea and the boundless sky harmoniously coexist with the rugged beauty of the mountains, offering a serene and picturesque escape where nature's splendour knows no bounds.
